fileOpenError.title: Error when opening file
fileOpenError.info: Make sure the file you've selected is a correct audio file, then try again

bufferDownloadingError.title: Error when downloading data
bufferDownloadingError.info: Check your Internet connection, then try again

errorProcessingAudio.title: Error processing audio
errorProcessingAudio.info: An error has occurred during audio processing. Please try again.

audioPlayer.preparingAudioDownloadWithCompatibility: Due to compatibility mode and technical constraints, we have to play the audio in real time in order to record it

notifications.compatibilityModeAutoEnabled: Compatibility mode has been automatically enabled, as a problem with your web browser has been detected
notifications.hasProblemRenderingAudio: A problem has been detected with your web browser when rendering audio. Try to enable the compatibility mode, or modify the filters applied.

soundtouch.name: Change speed / frequency
soundtouch.info: This filter lets you not only change the speed of the audio, but also its frequency. You can make the audio sound higher or lower.

settings.title: Settings of the filter Change speed / frequency
settings.label: Here you can set audio speed and frequency (high/low).

bassboost.name: Bass booster
bassboost.info: This filter lets you boost the bass of your audio. You can set the frequency to be boosted and the boost power (in dB). It is advisable to use this tool in conjunction with the limiter, to avoid unpleasant saturation.

settings.title: Bass booster settings
settings.label: Here you can set the bass booster parameters.
settings.frequencyBoost: Boost frequency (boosts frequencies equal to or below - in Hz):
settings.attenuateFrequency: Attenuation frequency (attenuates frequencies above - in Hz):

bitcrusher.name: 8-bit Effect
bitcrusher.info: This filter allows you to achieve an effect similar to the sound produced by retro video game consoles.

settings.title: 8-bit effect settings
settings.label: Here you can edit the settings for the 8-bit effect.

echo.name: Echo
echo.info: This filter allows you to get a customizable echo effect.

settings.title: Echo effect settings
settings.label: Here you can edit the settings of the echo effect.

highpass.name: Highpass filter
highpass.info: This filter allows you to attenuate audio frequencies below a threshold.

settings.title: Highpass filter settings
settings.label: Here you can edit the settings of the highpass filter.

lowpass.name: Lowpass filter
lowpass.info: This filter allows you to attenuate audio frequencies above a threshold.

settings.title: Lowpass filter settings
settings.label: Here you can edit the settings of the lowpass filter.

returnAudio.name: Reverse audio
returnAudio.info: This filter allows you to reverse the audio.

telephonizer.name: Telephone call effect
telephonizer.info: This filter allows you to mimic the sound produced by a phone broadcasting your audio.

vocoder.name: Vocoder (robotic voice)
vocoder.info: This filter allows you to apply a robotic voice effect to your audio.

settings.title: Vocoder settings
settings.label: You can adjust the vocoder settings. Default settings are sufficient most of the time, but you can modify the tonality of the filter by trying to tweak them.

limiter.name: Limiter (recommended)
limiter.info: This filter helps reduce saturation and distortion that may occur depending on the filters you activate. It is strongly recommended to keep it enabled.

settings.title: Limiter settings
settings.label: You can adjust the limiter's settings here. The default settings have been tested on many audio files and work in most cases.

reverb.name: Reverb
reverb.info: This filter allows you to apply a reverb effect to your audio. Several virtual environments are offered, each with a different reverb effect for each of these environments.

settings.title: Reverb Filter Settings
settings.label: You can adjust the reverb filter settings here.
settings.downloaded: This environment has already been temporarily downloaded to your device
settings.notDownloaded: This environment has not been downloaded yet. By clicking Validate, the environment will be temporarily downloaded to your device.
settings.customEnvironmentAddDuration: Duration to be added to sound (seconds):

reverb.disabled: This filter is currently unavailable, as no environment has yet been downloaded. Go to the filter settings, then select and download an environment, then click on Validate.
